title: If any general candidate got a 49 percentage in graduation, will he apply for the TGT? - Quora

response.answer_text: The min eligibility for TGT exam is either you should have a 4 years integrated degree from NCERT with min 50% marks in the concerned subject as well as in the aggregate or a Bachelors Degree or equivalent from a recognized University with minimum 50% marks in aggregate as well as in the concerned subject.
